Title: Aikatsu Friends!: Kagayaki no Jewel
Description: ['The story takes place two years after ', Aikatsu Friends!, ' with Aine Yuuki now in high school. One day she has an encounter with the mysterious idol Hibiki Tenshou who wears the shining Jeweling Dress.', '\n', '\n']
